properties.description:
This rule detects potentially malicious attachment downloads by monitoring email activity. It triggers an alert when:

An attachment is downloaded from an email sent by a sender whose emails have been previously quarantined.
An attachment is downloaded from an email that has been classified as phishing by DFO.
An attachment is downloaded following a click on a URL within an email that has been identified as a phishing link.
properties.query:
let ZAPPEDEmail =
EmailPostDeliveryEvents
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where ActionType in ("Spam ZAP","Phish ZAP")
| project NetworkMessageId,RecipientEmailAddress
| join kind=inner (EmailAttachmentInfo
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| project FileName,FileSize,NetworkMessageId) on NetworkMessageId
| join kind=inner (DeviceFileEvents
        | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h))
        on
        FileName,
        FileSize,
        $left.RecipientEmailAddress == $right.InitiatingProcessAccountUpn
    | where ActionType == "FileCreated"
    | extend Case = "Attachment Downloaded/Viewed before an email was ZAPPED";
let BlockedEmails = EmailEvents
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
    | where DeliveryAction == "Blocked" and DeliveryLocation == "Quarantine"
    | summarize
        QuarantinedEmailsCount = dcount(NetworkMessageId),
        BlockedRecipientsCount = dcount(RecipientEmailAddress)
        by SenderFromAddress;
let PotentialPhishSender = EmailEvents
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
    | where EmailDirection == "Inbound"
    | where DeliveryAction != "Blocked"
    | summarize
        EmailsCount = dcount(NetworkMessageId),
        RecipientsCount = dcount(RecipientEmailAddress)
        by SenderFromAddress
    | join kind=inner BlockedEmails on SenderFromAddress
    | where QuarantinedEmailsCount > EmailsCount or BlockedRecipientsCount > RecipientsCount;
let PotentialPhishing = 
    EmailEvents
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(14d) 
    | where EmailDirection == "Inbound"
    | where DeliveryAction != "Blocked"
    | where AttachmentCount != 0
    | where OrgLevelAction != "Allow"
    | where UserLevelAction != "Allow"
    | join kind=inner PotentialPhishSender on SenderFromAddress
    | join kind=inner EmailAttachmentInfo on NetworkMessageId, RecipientEmailAddress, SenderFromAddress
    | join kind=inner (DeviceFileEvents
        | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h))
        on
        FileName,
        FileSize,
        $left.RecipientEmailAddress == $right.InitiatingProcessAccountUpn
    | where ActionType == "FileCreated"
    | extend Case = "Suspicious Sender";
let PhishEmail = EmailEvents
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(14d) 
    | where ThreatTypes contains "phish"
    | where EmailDirection == "Inbound"
    | where DeliveryAction != "Blocked"
    | where AttachmentCount != 0
    | where OrgLevelAction != "Allow" 
    | where UserLevelAction != "Allow"
    | join kind=inner EmailAttachmentInfo on NetworkMessageId, RecipientEmailAddress, SenderFromAddress
    | join kind=inner (DeviceFileEvents
        | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h))
        on
        FileName,
        FileSize,
        $left.RecipientEmailAddress == $right.InitiatingProcessAccountUpn
    | where ActionType == "FileCreated"
    | extend Case = "Phish email delivered";
let PotentialPhishingCloudApps = 
    EmailEvents
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(14d) 
    | where EmailDirection == "Inbound"
    | where DeliveryAction != "Blocked"
    | where AttachmentCount != 0
    | where OrgLevelAction != "Allow"
    | where UserLevelAction != "Allow"
    | join kind=inner PotentialPhishSender on SenderFromAddress
    | join kind=inner EmailAttachmentInfo on NetworkMessageId, RecipientEmailAddress, SenderFromAddress
    | join kind=inner (CloudAppEvents
        | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
        | where ActionType in ("FileDownloadedFromBrowser")
        | extend FilePath = tostring(parse_json(RawEventData).ObjectId)
        | project
            UserId = tostring(parse_json(RawEventData).UserId),
            FilePath,
            FileName = tostring(split(FilePath, "\\").[-1]),
            FileSize = tolong(parse_json(RawEventData).FileSize))
        on FileName, FileSize, $left.RecipientEmailAddress == $right.UserId
    | extend Case = "Suspicious Sender";
let PhishEmailCloudApps = EmailEvents
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(14d) 
    | where ThreatTypes contains "phish"
    | where EmailDirection == "Inbound"
    | where DeliveryAction != "Blocked"
    | where AttachmentCount != 0
    | where OrgLevelAction != "Allow" 
    | where UserLevelAction != "Allow"
    | join kind=inner EmailAttachmentInfo on NetworkMessageId, RecipientEmailAddress, SenderFromAddress
    | join kind=inner (CloudAppEvents
        | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
        | where ActionType in ("FileDownloadedFromBrowser")
        | extend FilePath = tostring(parse_json(RawEventData).ObjectId)
        | project
            UserId = tostring(parse_json(RawEventData).UserId),
            FilePath,
            FileName = tostring(split(FilePath, "\\").[-1]),
            FileSize = tolong(parse_json(RawEventData).FileSize))
        on FileName, FileSize, $left.RecipientEmailAddress == $right.UserId
    | extend Case = "Phish email delivered";
PotentialPhishing
| union PhishEmail
| union PotentialPhishingCloudApps
| union PhishEmailCloudApps
| union ZAPPEDEmail
| where isnotempty(SenderFromAddress)
| where not (FileName matches regex @"^image\d{3}\.(png|jpg)$")
